data.title: Should Former Government Leaders Be Subject to Prosecution After Their Term in Office? The Case of South African President P.W. Botha
data.meta_description: By Paul Lansing and Julie King Perry, Published on 01/01/99
data.text:
Recommended Citation

Lansing, Paul and King Perry, Julie (1999) "Should Former Government Leaders Be Subject to Prosecution After Their Term in Office? The Case of South African President P.W. Botha," California Western International Law Journal: Vol. 30: No. 1, Article 13.

Available at: https://scholarlycommons.law.cwsl.edu/cwilj/vol30/iss1/13
